title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 580.20 - Extension of time by consent
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 580.20 - Extension of time by consent

State Regulations

Any time period specified in this Part may be extended for
good cause by written mutual consent of the project sponsor and the agency
staff. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
580.20

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
